import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set asset owners"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/owner/bulk"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assigns or transfers ownership for multiple assets in a single operation. Supports assigning new owners or clearing ownership entirely.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ToAssetId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify assets and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **OwnerId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find users and extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for assets to assign: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) filtered by location or type.
2. Search for users: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to get owner UUIDs.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/owner/bulk](/docs/api/assets/bulk-set-asset-owner) with asset-owner pairs.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Array of \{ToAssetId, OwnerId\} objects. Set `UpdateAssetWithUserLocation: true` to sync asset location.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request to set or transfer ownership of an asset. Supports transferring ownership from one asset to another, or assigning a new owner directly.","properties":{"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the new owner (user). Obtain from POST /api/v1.0/users search."},"FromAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to transfer ownership from"},"FromAssetStatusId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Status to set on the 'from' asset after transfer"},"FromAssetReason":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Reason for removing ownership from the 'from' asset"},"ToAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to transfer ownership to"},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Associated ticket UUID for the ownership change"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product context for the operation"},"ToAssetReason":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Reason for assigning ownership to the target asset"},"Force":{"type":"boolean","description":"Force the ownership change even if validations would normally prevent it","default":false},"Source":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Source system or integration initiating the change"},"UpdateAssetWithUserLocation":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"description":"When true, update the asset's location to match the new owner's location"},"UpdateAssetWithUserRoom":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"description":"When true, update the asset's room to match the new owner's room"},"SkipRulesProcessing":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, bypass rule engine processing for this change","default":false},"DueDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Expected return date for checked-out assets"},"InventoryOptions":{"nullable":true,"description":"Inventory-related options for the ownership change","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Options for inventory-related operations when changing asset ownership or location.","properties":{"Quantity":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Quantity of inventory items to transfer"},"ToEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Target entity UUID for the inventory transfer"},"ToEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity type UUID of the target entity"},"ToLocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Target location UUID for the inventory transfer"},"ToLocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Target room UUID within the location"}},"title":"AssetInventoryOptions"}],"type":"object"}},"title":"SetAssetOwnerRequest"},"title":"BulkSetAssetOwnerRequest"},"example":[{"ToAssetId":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","OwnerId":"aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee","UpdateAssetWithUserLocation":true},{"ToAssetId":"22222222-3333-4444-5555-666666666666","OwnerId":"bbbbbbbb-cccc-dddd-eeee-ffffffffffff"}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
